title: Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the First Lady


For Immediate Release
November 23, 2015

 



Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama





Tune In: On Thursday, November 26th, Broadway at The White House will air at 8:00 PM ET on TLC.  Click HERE for more information.

Friday, November 27, 2015

The White House * North Portico * 11:00 AM – On Friday, November 27th, First Lady Michelle Obama will welcome the Official White House Christmas Tree to the White House.

	This year’s White House Christmas Tree, which will be on display in the Blue Room, is an 18.5-foot Fraser fir grown by Jay and Glenn Bustard in Lansdale, Pennsylvania.  The Bustards will present the tree to Mrs. Obama. 

	Members of the National Christmas Tree Association have presented the official White House Christmas Tree for display in the Blue Room since 1966.
